      boolean isDpdUnitMass()
      Flag for use of DPD unit masses: True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1 False: The DPD mass of the most lightweight particle (often water) is set to 1.

      Flag for initial potential energy minimisation step output.
      boolean isVelocityScaling()

      • SimulationDescription

        public SimulationDescription(int aTimeStepNumber,
                             double aTimeStepLength,
                             int aTimeStepFrequencyForOutput,
                             int anInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepNumber,
                             boolean anIsInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput,
                             PeriodicBoundaries aPeriodicBoundaries,
                             boolean anIsDpdUnitMass,
                             boolean anIsVelocityScaling)
        Constructor Note: NO checks are performed.
        Parameters:
        aTimeStepNumber - Number of time steps
        aTimeStepLength - Time step length
        aTimeStepFrequencyForOutput - Time step frequency for output
        anInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepNumber - Number of initial potential energy minimisation steps
        anIsInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput - Flag for initial potential energy minimisation step output
        aPeriodicBoundaries - Periodic boundaries
        anIsDpdUnitMass - Flag for use of DPD unit masses
        anIsVelocityScaling - True: Velocity scaling is performed for every simulation step, false: Otherwise

      • isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput

        public boolean isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput()
        Flag for initial potential energy minimisation step output.
        Returns:
        True: Potential energy minimisation step output is generated, false: Otherwise (NO output)

      • getPeriodicBoundaries

        public PeriodicBoundaries getPeriodicBoundaries()
        Periodic boundaries
        Returns:
        Periodic boundaries

      • isDpdUnitMass

        public boolean isDpdUnitMass()
        Flag for use of DPD unit masses: True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1 False: The DPD mass of the most lightweight particle (often water) is set to 1. The masses of all other particles are set in relation to their molar mass ratios to the most lightweight particle.
        Returns:
        Flag for use of DPD unit masses

      • isVelocityScaling

        public boolean isVelocityScaling()
        True: Velocity scaling is performed for every simulation step, false: Otherwise
        Returns:
        True: Velocity scaling is performed for every simulation step, false: Otherwise
